name: My ordinary life
description:
An ordinary day of an ordinary guy.

... But a guy maybe too nice.

When you accept every request we ask you for, an ordinary day can become unstable... and even chaotic.

In An Ordinary day, you must complete basics quests which open new quests which open events which open quests... And little by little the world change... and collapse.

Or at least it should have been that but, hey, the clock was harsh.

**_Controls (Keyboard/Gamepad) :_**

• Arrows / stick : movement

• Space / Y : jump

• Key E / A : interact
